description: The death toll rises in Kenya. A looming government shutdown. And cracking down on fake online reviews.
title: PODCAST: Kenya death toll and the U.S. government shutdown
teaser: The death toll rises in Kenya. A looming government shutdown. And cracking down on fake online reviews.

itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, September 23, 2013
contentencoded:
How will the markets react to another government shutdown deadline?

The death toll rises after terrorists attack a symbol of commerce in Kenya.

New York's Attorney General has slapped 19 companies with fines for writing fake online reviews.
